recipesJson.name: Fresh Nerves
recipesJson.author: PerennialPhilosopher
recipesJson.description: A tobacco custard. Chocolate and coffee notes play with hints of cinnamon in the sweet and dark custard clouds

reviews.text: Fair warning: I don't have FA custard, so subbed INW custard at the same percentage. Awesome recipe. Classic for dark is a great flavor which has some ashy, dark, sweet, earthy and a little boozy. It definitely shines through here. I love creamy tobaccos and the custards with the cream, marshmallow, and liquid amber give the right amount of creaminess and moisture back to the tobacco.  One of my favorite flavors atm, will definitely be making a larger batch very soon
Great flavor profile here.  Really brings out the Dark for Pipe.
